actions.name: Antennae
actions.desc: The rust monster corrodes a nonmagic metal object within 5 feet. It can destroy up to a 1-foot-square portion of an unattended object. If the object is worn or carried  the objects owner makes a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw  avoiding the rust monsters antennae on a success.

actions.name: Metal shields or armor the rust monster touches with its antennae corrode, taking a permanent -1 penalty to its AC protection per hit
actions.desc: If the penalty reduces the armors AC protection to 10  the armor is destroyed. If a metal weapon is touched  it is subject to the Rust Metal trait.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Defensive Bite
reactions.desc: When the rust monster is hit by a melee attack made by a creature it can see within 5 feet, it bites the attacker.

special_abilities.name: Metal Detection
special_abilities.desc: The rust monster can smell metal within 30 feet.

special_abilities.name: Rust Metal
special_abilities.desc: A nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the rust monster corrodes after dealing damage, taking a permanent -1 penalty to damage rolls per hit. If this penalty reaches -5, the weapon is destroyed. Metal nonmagical ammunition is destroyed after dealing damage.
